name: Ivanhoe
overview: Enter the medieval and mystical era where Ivanhoe, our chivalrous hero, pursues a perilous quest...A quest that would scare away most mortals...An adventure that most men would fear! Put on your armour, take your sword and launch your assault on the magical powers of the most diabolical of wizards, pirates, repulsive dragons and a whole clique of hideous beings in this age of legend. An unofficial remake of the original Atari ST\Amiga game from 1989.
